desc: Numb Master presented you Numb Cream with 5% lidocaine. Doctors recommended because of its aloe vera base, which helps with soothing and inflammation, making it best numbing option for waxing, tattoos, micro-needling.

layout.text: Maximum Strength Long-Lasting Pain Relief Cream, Fast Acting Topical Anesthetic Cream with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, Lecithin with Child Resistant Cap 4.2oz
